declarations.description:
A way to group together options, with or without heading.

```html
 <sl-select>
   <sl-select-option-group group-heading="Europ">
   <sl-select-option>Netherlands</sl-select-option>
   <sl-select-option>Spain</sl-select-option>
     <sl-select-option>Poland</sl-select-option>
   </sl-select-option-group>
 </sl-select>
```
declarations.name: SelectOptionGroup

members.name: groupHeading
members.description: The heading of the option group

fields.name: groupHeading
fields.description: The heading of the option group

A way to group together options, with or without heading.

```html
 <sl-select>
   <sl-select-option-group group-heading="Europ">
```

members.name: maxOverlayHeight
members.description: The maximum size the dropdown can have; only used when there are  enough options and enough space on the screen.

members.name: placeholder
members.description: The placeholder text to show when no option is chosen.

fields.name: maxOverlayHeight
fields.description: The maximum size the dropdown can have; only used when there are  enough options and enough space on the screen.

fields.name: placeholder
fields.description: The placeholder text to show when no option is chosen.

fields.name: selectedOption
fields.description: The current node selected in the list of options.

declarations.name: Basic
declarations.default:
{
  args: {
    size: 'md',
    maxOverlayHeight: '200px',
    placeholder: 'Placeholder'
  },
  render: ({ maxOverlayHeight, size, placeholder }) => html`
    <style>
      sl-select {
        width: 400px;
        max-width: 90vw;
        display: inline-flex;
      }
    </style>
    <sl-button>To focus</sl-button>
    <sl-select .maxOverlayHeight=${maxOverlayHeight} .size=${size} .placeholder=${placeholder}>
      <sl-select-option-group group-heading="Happy">
        <sl-select-option>üòÑ Grinning Face with Smiling Eyes</sl-select-option>
        <sl-select-option>üòÇ Face with Tears of Joy</sl-select-option>
        <sl-select-option>üòä Smiling Face with Smiling Eyes</sl-select-option>
        <sl-select-option>ü§© Star-Struck</sl-select-option>
        <sl-select-option disabled>üôÇ Slightly Smiling Face</sl-select-option>
        <sl-select-option>ü•≥ Partying Face</sl-select-option>
      </sl-select-option-group>
      <sl-select-option>üò∂ Unfazed</sl-select-option>
      <sl-select-option-group group-heading="Sad">
        <sl-select-option>üòí Unamused Face</sl-select-option>
        <sl-select-option>ü§ß Sneezing Face</sl-select-option>
        <sl-select-option>üòì Downcast Face with Sweat</sl-select-option>
        <sl-select-option>üò° Enraged Face</sl-select-option>
      </sl-select-option-group>
      <sl-select-option-group>
        <sl-select-option>üê∑ Pig</sl-select-option>
        <sl-select-option selected>üê® Koala</sl-select-option>
        <sl-select-option>üêº Panda</sl-select-option>
        <sl-select-option>ü¶ä Fox</sl-select-option>
      </sl-select-option-group>
      <sl-select-option>ü§ñ Robot</sl-select-option>
    </sl-select>
    <sl-button>To focus</sl-button>
  `
}

declarations.name: All
CustomComponents
declarations.default:
{
  render: () => html`
    <style>
      sl-avatar {
        margin: 0 4px;
      }
    </style>
    <sl-button>To focus</sl-button>
    <sl-select>
      <sl-select-option><sl-avatar uniqueProfileId="1"></sl-avatar></sl-select-option>
      <sl-select-option selected><sl-avatar uniqueProfileId="2"></sl-avatar></sl-select-option>
      <sl-select-option><sl-avatar uniqueProfileId="3"></sl-avatar></sl-select-option>
      <sl-select-option><sl-avatar uniqueProfileId="14"></sl-avatar></sl-select-option>
      <sl-select-option disabled><sl-avatar uniqueProfileId="4"></sl-avatar></sl-select-option>
      <sl-select-option><sl-avatar uniqueProfileId="5"></sl-avatar></sl-select-option>
    </sl-select>
    <sl-button>To focus</sl-button>
  `
}

declarations.name: InForm
declarations.default:
{
  render: () => html`
    <style>
      form {
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
      }

      sl-label {
        margin-block-start: 0.5rem;
      }
      sl-button-bar {
        margin-block-start: 1rem;
      }

      sl-avatar {
        margin: 0 4px;
      }
    </style>
    <form @submit=${onSubmit}>
      <sl-label for="smiley">Smiley</sl-label>
      <sl-select id="smiley" name="smiley" required>
        <sl-select-option>üòç Option 1 </sl-select-option>
        <sl-select-option>ü•∏ Option 2 </sl-select-option>
        <sl-select-option>ü§î Option 3 </sl-select-option>
        <sl-select-option>üòÖ Option 4 </sl-select-option>
        <sl-select-option disabled>ü§™ Option 5 </sl-select-option>
        <sl-select-option>ü´£ Option 6 </sl-select-option>
      </sl-select>

      <sl-label for="avatar">Avatar</sl-label>
      <sl-select id="avatar" name="avatar">
        <sl-select-option value="0"><sl-avatar uniqueProfileId="0"></sl-avatar></sl-select-option>
        <sl-select-option value="1"><sl-avatar uniqueProfileId="1"></sl-avatar></sl-select-option>
        <sl-select-option value="2" selected><sl-avatar uniqueProfileId="2"></sl-avatar></sl-select-option>
        <sl-select-option value="3"><sl-avatar uniqueProfileId="3"></sl-avatar></sl-select-option>
        <sl-select-option value="4" disabled><sl-avatar uniqueProfileId="4"></sl-avatar></sl-select-option>
        <sl-select-option value="14"><sl-avatar uniqueProfileId="14"></sl-avatar></sl-select-option>
      </sl-select>

      <sl-label for="mood">Your mood</sl-label>
      <sl-select id="mood" name="mood" placeholder="How are you feeling today?">
        <sl-select-option-group group-heading="Happy">
          <sl-select-option>üòÑ Grinning Face with Smiling Eyes</sl-select-option>
          <sl-select-option>üòÇ Face with Tears of Joy</sl-select-option>
          <sl-select-option>üòä Smiling Face with Smiling Eyes</sl-select-option>
          <sl-select-option>ü§© Star-Struck</sl-select-option>
          <sl-select-option disabled>üôÇ Slightly Smiling Face</sl-select-option>
          <sl-select-option>ü•≥ Partying Face</sl-select-option>
        </sl-select-option-group>
        <sl-select-option-group group-heading="Sad">
          <sl-select-option>üòí Unamused Face</sl-select-option>
          <sl-select-option>ü§ß Sneezing Face</sl-select-option>
          <sl-select-option>üòì Downcast Face with Sweat</sl-select-option>
          <sl-select-option>üò° Enraged Face</sl-select-option>
        </sl-select-option-group>
        <sl-select-option>ü§ñ Robot</sl-select-option>
      </sl-select>

      <sl-button-bar align="end">
        <sl-button type="reset">Reset</sl-button>
        <sl-button type="submit">Submit</sl-button>
      </sl-button-bar>
    </form>
  `
}

members.name: maxOverlayHeight
members.description: The maximum size the dropdown can have; only used when there are  enough options and enough space on the screen.

members.name: placeholder
members.description: The placeholder text to show when no option is chosen.

attributes.name: max-overlay-height
attributes.description: The maximum size the dropdown can have; only used when there are  enough options and enough space on the screen.

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.description: The placeholder text to show when no option is chosen.

methods.name: #handleMutation
methods.description: If an option is selected programmatically update all the options or the size of the select itself

methods.name: #handleOptionChange
methods.description: One of the options in the select has been clicked, get the right target and update the selection

methods.name: #handleOptionFocus
methods.description: Make sure the focus is on the currently selected option

methods.name: #updateSelectedOption
methods.description: Update the selected option with attributes and values.

methods.name: #setSelectedOptionVisible
methods.description: Copy the value/represenation of the selected option to the placeholder

fields.name: #observerOptions
#rovingTabindexController
selectedOption
fields.description: The current node selected in the list of options.
